name: Try To Fit In
description:
This is a comedic survival horror game about surviving corporate conference calls. Engage in the meeting, say the right words, and try to fit in!

Features Include:

  • Fast Paced QTE sequence

  • Comedic dialogue

Accomplishments

  • Learned and created a game in Unreal Engine 4 in 7 days.

  • Created a quick time event system that determines success and failure states

  • Created a custom UI that clearly conveyed to the player actions that needs to be performed

  • Created a win and fail state in the video game and had the NPCs respond to it.

Goals

  • Ship a game in an engine I don't know in 7 days

  • Always have a clean build throughout the development

  • Tell a story that matters
